message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $950000 for it. This offers a significant value to you while ensuring a substantial return for us. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this price is more in line with the value I'm looking to get from the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value we place on our product and our current market position, I am willing to consider a price of $900000 for the product. This still offers a good return for us while being competitive in the market. I look forward to your response.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $875000 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
